DOC.brief_summary: 90 American society anesthesiology ( ASA ) physical status I II patient undergo general anesthesia elective surgery include study . Patients randomize three group . Group E receive esmolol ( 1 mg/kg ) , Group IL lidocaine ( 1.5 mg/kg ) Group C placebo ( NaCl 0.9 % , 5 mL ) , follow 0.05 mg/kg rocuronium . After intravenous induction propofol , adequate muscle relaxation intubation receive 0.5 mg/kg rocuronium .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients observe injection rocuronium 0.05mg/kg , immediately ask pain arm .
